text: Soni chondechonde ngachikasakamuchisya pameso Pakwe (Allah) ikaŵeje kwa jwampele luusa (lwakuti achondelele). Mpaka pati woga uli utyosile m’mitima mwao (Achimalaika) akasatiji: “Ana M’mbuje gwenu juŵechete ichichi?” (Achimalaika ŵane) akutiji: “(Jwalakwe juŵechete) yakuonaonape, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwapenani kusyene, Jwankulungwa kwannope.”
